text: Ana hute'na kavesima kante'za monko'zama hunegantaza vahe'mofo zamazampi kavre anta'nenke'za, ana vahe'mo'za kazeri haviza nehu'za, monkozama nehana kumatamine, havi anumzantamima mono'ma hunentana nontaminena kahe'za tagana vazitregahaze. Ana nehu'za kukenaka'ane kavasese zanka'anena kahe'za eri hatetresagenka kavufga avapako manigahane.
